alert.note: Alert for Berrien; Cook; Irwin; Tift (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 6:11PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Cook, south central Irwin, Berrien and southeastern Tift Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 610 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles south of Mystic to near Enigma to 7 miles northeast of Nashville. Movement was southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Nashville, Adel, Tifton, Sparks, Enigma, Lenox, Alapaha, Eldorado, New Lois, Gladys, Massee, Glory, Flat Ford, Wagon Wheel, Allenville, Weber, Vanceville, Cottle, Cook Co A/P and Staunton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
